techmeme.title: Disney, Fox, and WBD say they have collectively agreed to discontinue their Venu Sports streaming venture, and will focus on existing products (Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter)
In a weird X Spaces chat, Elon Musk and Alice Weidel, a co-chair of the German far-right party AfD, pushed disinformation about Hitler, migrants, war, and more (Politico)
A look at Meta's convoluted or contradictory hate speech examples for user content moderators, allowing derogatory remarks about races, nationalities, and more (Sam Biddle/The Intercept)
A look at LexisNexis Risk Solutions, RELX's largest division, which accounts for ~35% of RELX's revenue and holds 9B device records and 3B digital identities (John Gapper/Financial Times)
More than half a dozen celebrity video game streamers returned to Twitch in 2024, after their multimillion-dollar contracts with YouTube and Kick expired (Cecilia D'Anastasio/Bloomberg)
